description.@en: One must have a callous indifference towards the sanctity of life to move from being a tourney archer to a hunter of men. Targeteers who are consumed by the act of killing are utterly corrupted, while others who maintain proper decorum will remain untainted by their grisly work.

effect.@en: When you take an innocent life unprovoked, you automatically gain 1 permanent Chaos Rank.
